name: Blocky Bernie - Feel the Bern! Get Bernie Sandwhiches!
name_original: Blocky Bernie - Feel the Bern! Get Bernie Sandwhiches!
description:
The most popular Bernie game on the Appstore!

Play as your favorite presidential candidate, Bernie! In this game play as Bernie as you walk through the United States eating sandwiches.

The game is pretty simple, tap to walk. If you tap too slow you will fall forward and if you tap too fast you will fall backward! It's a game of balance as Bernie runs for the Whitehouse!

DISCLAIMER:
Blocky Bernie is NOT AFFILIATED or ENDORSED by the Bernie Sanders campaign, but if you want to support the official Bernie 2016 campaign, go to http://BernieSanders.com and make a donation or volunteer.
